text: This role is available for only US based candidate :pleading_face:

:rocket: Looking for a Skilled HubSpot Developer :rocket:

Hey everyone! 

I’m looking for a HubSpot developer who can:
	•	Build custom automation actions using JavaScript or Python to enhance workflows and bots
	•	Create advanced custom code actions
	•	Make API calls
	•	Run SQL queries
	•	Model objects, and more
	•	Make PATCH requests to update HubSpot CRM schemas via the API
	•	Work seamlessly with the HubSpot API to update, integrate, and connect data
	•	Utilize *Operations Hub* for complex automation and integration use cases
	•	Write clean, efficient, and scalable code

:bulb: Details:
This will start as a few small projects but has the potential to grow into a long-term partnership for the right person.

:envelope_with_arrow: If this sounds like you, please send me a DM with:
    a. Your LinkedIn profile
    b. Your hourly rate
    c. Notes on any similar work you have done
